channel.title: United PK Dev. Team
channel.description:
Some of you may have heard of WhatevaScape, maybe you haven't. I quit it because of numerous problems including FREQUENT server crashing, terrible lag, shops disconnected you, nulls swarmed the server, and many more. I realized PimpScape is not an excellent source to start with. It has MANY errors in its coding. I now am making a new server, United PK. You MUST have experience to apply! I am in need of the following:
[ul][list][li][b][s]Server Coders[/s][/b][/li][/list] [list][li][b]Client Coders[/b][/li][/list] [list][li][b][s]Forums Coders[/s][/b][/li][/list] [list][li][b]*Server Staff[/b][/li] [/list]
[size=8pt]*I will pm you if I think you are suitable for the job, if you accept, you have the position.[/size]
[center][b][u][size=12pt]Server Coders[/size][/u][/b][/center] [center]Divinity Newb 2341 evoman f 2 p 2 p f [/center]
[center][b][u][size=12pt]Client Coders[/size][/u][/b][/center] [center]sgt yoshi [/center]
[center][b][u][size=12pt]Forums Managers[/size][/u][/b][/center] [center]master_montage[/center]
I need a Dev. team that can spend time with the server/client/community whenever I need your help, if you are very unactive, don't bother applying. I plan on having a temporary server/client coder(s) because at a certain point, you can't do much.
Application Form:[/ul] [code]Position? Can you do what I've asked? Do you have experience in any of the above? Why should you be picked?[/code]
I am trying to accomplish the following goals with my team:
[ul][li]Make a ::item command for the server as I loot I didn't make one for Satan's Isle.[/li] [li]Make the client a webclient.[/li] [li]Make/get a client background.[/li] [li]Re-add in an ancients tablet with working ancients and a mage book icon in the client.[/li] [li]Re-add teleports in, as I loot I removed them.[/li] [li]Find a new UNIQUE training area.[/li] [li][s]Add moving water/lava to client.[/s][/li] [li]Add working cwars and dueling.[/li][/ul]

item.title: United PK Dev. Team
item.dc:creator: @x2blood2x x2blood2x
item.description:
@x2blood2x wrote:

Good job Matt, thanks for completely ignoring Layla and I. So, i’m taking MY forums down. And MY website is going to be changed to something else. I didn’t sign up for this.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @kenzoj kenzoj
item.description:
@kenzoj wrote:

Position? server staff
Can you do what I’ve asked? yea sure
Do you have experience in any of the above? uhm yes i had a server too but its down now:(
Why should you be picked? server staff must folo the rules and need to kick players when they mass and all that stuff and i can;)

Read full topic

item.title: United PK Dev. Team
item.dc:creator: @xXxDtaixXx xXxDtaixXx
item.description:
@xXxDtaixXx wrote:

Heya Matt

Position? Server Staff
Can you do what I’ve asked? I can do a few things, coding isn’t my thing as you know. But, I am deeply devoted on helping members on these private servers to my upmost ability
Do you have experience in any of the above? I have beed modded and admin’d on a few servers as you know
Why should you be picked? I don’t like to be conseded, but with the staff i’ve seen on other servers, they don’t give 100% to their players. I devote my time online to them

~Dtai

Read full topic

@Soule wrote:

Position? Admin on server
Can you do what I’ve asked? Yea, but i do not code, but i know alot about helping with stuff.
Do you have experience in any of the above? Staff and helping
Why should you be picked? Because I love you and you love me!

item.title: United PK Dev. Team
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Pwnz0r Teh Pwnz0r
item.description:
@Teh_Pwnz0r wrote:

Position? - Server Staff
Can you do what I’ve asked? - I will use all my powers to enforce what you have asked of me or anyone else
Do you have experience in any of the above? - Yes, i have played admin on about 15 servers and all owners have been happy with my input towards enforcing the rules

Why should you be picked? - As i said, i have a lot of experience and i do anything to make your server a better one for everyone

Read full topic
